text: Sinaamey sin Rabbi inki nafsik (Aadam kinnuk) sin gineeh, tohuk lakat kay barrá kaak gine (Caawa kinnuk) kaadu lacak bacra qaynat siinih oobise lab-tii kee say-tiyah anuk, sin inaanih bagut sin gina ginóok-ginô lakal (qunxuffeey, dabloytaay, cadoyta kinnuk) sidiica diteh addat (baguuy, maxaxaay, urri- walammâ dite kinnuk). Toh sin Yallaay, sin Rabbi ummaanim giné, reedá lem Ķaa, Kaak-sá cakkil yaqbuden Yalli mayanak, toysa diggah Kay qibaadák mannal makkottaanaah
